Package game

Class Dinosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.Dinosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Allosaur, Brachiosaur, Pterodactyls, Stegosaur
public abstract class Dinosaur
extends Actor
An abstract class method to be inherited by each type of dinosaur.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Dinosaur.Stage
    A dinosaur stage can only be baby or adult.

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      This method is to check which behaviour should be performed by dinosaur at current play turn.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      each action based on the behaviour
